column5: What can I say? I was inspired by Doug's post and thought I'd share my own cam pic's.  I've had a rash of thefts lately down by the dock. Small shiny things usually....although a pack of chewing gum and a box of Twinkies mysteriously disappeared last week.  Unnerved by the happenings I installed a camera and was able to capture this incredible footage!  The regular cam produced a blurry but disturbing image:     When the infrared kicked in this startling image materialized:     Apparantly the rare and ellusive manther is attracted to musky baits!
... not quite that entertaining   ... a well maintained tacklebox catches fish!!!... anything less is housewife chatter!... now go put your apron on, you silly wench!!!
Yee wha???!!
I think I've seen one of those...
DANG.. I wonder if anything shiney is missing in my boat... man this thing gets around...
BAHAHAHA!  He's devious beast Wayne you'd best be on your guard.
Doesn't everyone organize their lures like that?  It keeps the amateurs from using them.
Is that a parasite? The twinkies missing doesnt surprise me....

Apparantly manthers like bright shiny things and brown tee shirts! HAHAHA!   I don't normally organize my lures like that. I was baiting for the manther and figured a giant shiny clump would be more attractive...  Guess it worked
See? Someone else knows the ways of the manther! Twinkies, Ho Ho's, Ding Dongs....whatever, manthers love 'em all.   Beware the FUPA!!
I'd be careful... you don't want to mess with the hulk.
Hey,that manther looks awfully familiar ???
I'm about 5 seconds away from pissing my pants!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!   Drive fast!  Less time on highway!
AHAHAHAHA!  Me too man, I'm making myself laugh.  I think a road trip is in order.
I think you are correct..  It's been way to long.  Let's just make sure we don't decimate any rivers or streams.   Cause ya know, you are well know for that.
I have no idea what any of you guys are talking about... going back to watching TV.
is this the culprit?
Mmmmmm.....hulk like Twinkies!
Too funny....
LOL...
